trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma função do Active Directory num ambiente de alojamento do Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Normalmente, o arquivo do Active Directory é utilizado para armazenar informações organizacionais para técnico.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the ActiveDirectoryRole is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: O objetivo principal para o ActiveDirectoryRole é para fazer consultas em relação a essas informações organizacionais por razões de negócio.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: Funções do Active Directory, normalmente, correspondem a uma função de trabalho, título ou skill tarefa dentro do contexto da organização.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções de relatório para a função atual direta ou indiretamente.

trans-unit.source: GetAllReports returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetAllReports devolve todos os nós abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>para devolver apenas os nós que estão diretamente abaixo do nó atual.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções que um direta ou indiretamente reportam a função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções que comunicam diretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: GetDirectReports returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: GetDirectReports devolve apenas os nós que estão diretamente abaixo do nó atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver todos os nós abaixo do nó atual utilize <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém todas as funções de relatório que diretamente para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a coleção genérica que contém todos os <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> objetos associados atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma função pode ser uma coleção de objetos de segurança geral.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use GetEntries to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Como tal, uma função pode conter várias identidades, por exemplo, utilizar GetEntries para devolver todos os objetos de diretório associados ao direito.

trans-unit.source: The generic <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> collection that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genérica <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> coleção que está associada a atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista das contas do Windows NT associado genérica o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetIdentities obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: GetIdentities obtém todos os <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objetos associados a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>e cada um deles converte um valor de cadeia.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de valores que representam as contas do Windows NT associadas genérica o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre o Gestor de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManager returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManager devolve o Gestor de direto para a função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Devolver todas as funções acima do nó atual, utilize <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o Gestor da função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre a cadeia administrativa associada atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetManagerialChain returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: GetManagerialChain devolve todos os nós acima a função atual.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para devolver apenas o Gestor de direto da função atual, utilize <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a cadeia administrativa associada com a função atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma função do Active Directory que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório que são supervisionados pelo Gestor de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>devolvido contém informações de todos os objetos geridos pelo gestor desta função, mas não contém estas informações da função atual.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> que contém informações sobre todas as operações de diretório que são supervisionados pelo Gestor de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma lista genérica de <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objetos associados atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetSecurityIdentifiers checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetSecurityIdentifiers verifica cada <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A>método para ver se a entrada tem um identificador de segurança na respetiva <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>coleção.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, GetSecurityIdentifiers adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>tem uma propriedade, GetSecurityIdentifiers adiciona um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>à lista de devolve.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista genérica de <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> objetos associados atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> contém a identidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Como uma função é uma generalização de um ou mais objetos, várias identidades podem ser descritas através de uma única função.

trans-unit.source: Use IncludesIdentity to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Utilize IncludesIdentity para testar a que uma identidade especificada está incluída nesta função.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A identidade para o qual pretende procurar.

trans-unit.source: to indicate that identity is included in the ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: para indicar que identity está incluído no ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o nome para descrever a função.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó do Active Directory de raiz associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: A entrada de raiz é a função de segurança a cadeia de funções que não tenha nenhum gestor.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> que representa o nó do Active Directory de raiz associado a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>permite que este objeto ser serializado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
